sentences.en: Friendship is the finest balm in need.
sentences.cn: 友情是在困难时刻的最好安慰.

sentences.en: He smeared some balm on his hand to soothe the pain.
sentences.cn: 他在手上涂了些药膏来止痛.

sentences.en: I suffer a malady that no balm can cure!
sentences.cn: 可叹的是我的病痛却找不到香膏来治愈.

sentences.en: It was like a balm to me.
Mr. Whitelaw's benevolence would descend like soothing balm.
sentences.cn: 怀特洛先生的仁慈就会象甘露一样从天而降.

sentences.en: Objective: In order to explore the effects of CD 40 antisense RNA on Balm cell.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨CD40反义RNA对Balm细胞的影响.

sentences.en: Oil and balm can be better, longer play a role.
sentences.cn: 而且香薰油也可更好 、 更长的发挥作用.

sentences.en: Sleep was a balm to his troubles.
sentences.cn: 睡眠使他把烦恼暂置脑后.

sentences.en: Solitude is delicious balm to my heart in this heavenly spot.
sentences.cn: 在这样神圣的地方,对我的心来说,幽静是珍贵的安慰.

sentences.en: That shop is selling a new skin balm.
sentences.cn: 那家商店正在出售一种新型的皮肤香油.

sentences.en: The new skin balm was welcome by middle - aged women.
sentences.cn: 这种新护肤香膏受到了 中年 妇女的欢迎.

sentences.en: The place is balm to the soul.
sentences.cn: 这个地方能给灵魂带来慰藉。

sentences.en: Weep away my child, tears act as a balm to some sorrow.
sentences.cn: 哭吧,我的孩子, 眼泪对有些伤心事是一种慰籍.

sentences.en: Your letter has been a balm to me.
sentences.cn: 你的来信对我是一种安慰.
